text: Zingem is a former municipality in the Belgian province of East Flanders. On 1 January 2019, Kruishoutem and Zingem were merged into the new municipality of Kruisem. In 2007, 6822 people lived there. It is at 50° 54 North, 03° 39 East. ==References== Category:Former municipalities of East Flanders
title: Zingem
